sourcesContent:
export default function RepresentationOverview() { return( <>

Owner's Representation Services

If you’re an owner wanting to build, you’ve probably got a lot of questions. You know what you want, but construction is a minefield. There is a chance you will emerge unscathed, but, unassisted, you are far more likely to fall victim to a process that can be as devastating as it is counter-intuitive. With timely and easy-to-understand technical advice, expert communication and planning assistance, a savvy owner’s rep will soon become your single biggest asset.

Stewart Consulting will keep you informed and in control, so your project is successfully completed

  • On time

  • For a fair price

  • Without upleasant surprises

Consider Stewart Consulting your personal watchdog where it counts so that relationships with architects and contractors are built on confidence and mutual respect. With informed and impartial advice every step of the way, you can enjoy this exciting time knowing you are getting the best deal possible.

For more information, see our step by step guide to our Owner's Representation services, or get in touch to speak with David directly.

  • {/*
    */}

    A bit about David Stewart

  • David Stewart has been working

    in the construction industry for over 40 years. His particular expertise in durability and troubled construction means sound advice you can count on. Read more

    Are you an architect, contractor or lawyer?

    An owner’s rep is a useful ingredient to maintaining great client relations. Take a look at how Stewart Consulting can help your customers feel confident in the good work you do.

    Find out more
    ) }
